Biggest threats in the area are r apid deforestation, habitat destruction, hydropower, climate change, illegal wildlife trade and overfishing. The unprecedented social and economic development of the Greater Mekong makes conservation work here especially urgent, significantand hugely chall enging. It also provides capacity building and techni cal training for communities and form private sector partnerships to develop small-scale forest and agroforestry enterprises.
